meanings.definition: The state of not being engaged or involved in something.
meanings.sent1: Her nonengagements in the meeting were noticeable as she sat quietly in the corner.
meanings.sent2: His nonengagements in social events often made him feel lonely.
meanings.sent3: The cat's nonengagements with the new toy were quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The nonengagements of the clouds with the sun created a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The student's nonengagements with the assignment led to a low grade.

meanings.definition: The act of refraining from engaging in a particular activity or situation.
meanings.sent1: His nonengagements in gossiping kept him out of trouble.
meanings.sent2: The nonengagements of the children in the game surprised the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The nonengagements of the dog in chasing squirrels was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: Her nonengagements in the drama at work saved her from unnecessary stress.
meanings.sent5: The nonengagements of the audience during the performance were unexpected.
